name: 10th anniversary of the Clearing House of Ukraine
generalDescription: The commemorative coin is dedicated to the 10th anniversary of the Clearing House
averseDescription: On the coin obverse framed by a conventionalized floral ornament there is the Small National Emblem of Ukraine, year of issue 2006, coin denomination – 10/ ГРИВЕНЬ (10/ HRYVNIAS) below, indication of the metal and its fineness Ag 925, weight in fineness 31.1 g, above there is the semicircular legend НАЦІОНАЛЬНИЙ БАНК УКРАЇНИ (NATIONAL BANK OF UKRAINE).
reverseDescription: On the coin reverse there is the building of the Clearing House of Ukraine, below there is the legend 10 /РОКІВ (10 YEARS) against the background of the Ancient Rus hryvnia, the semicircular inscription РАХУНКОВА ПАЛАТА (CLEARING HOUSE) above and a conventionalized floral ornament beneath.
